channel.title: Old Runescape Games?
channel.description:
So I was looking through a database of interface ID's and found some interesting ones. [code] 16161 Runesquares options 16227 Challenge 16240 Time per move 16248 Choose piece 16276 Runesquares 16367 Resign 16574 Runesquares 16669 Close 16847 Runeversi 16938 Resign 16939 Offer Draw 17073 Runeversi options 17139 Challlenge 17152 Time per move 17160 Choose piece 17192 Runeversi 17288 Close 17525 Click the [/code]
They seem to be old Runescape games, I think. I've never seen these in my life. What were they and how did they work?

item.title: Old Runescape Games?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

You’re welcome? I mean, it is commong sense really. If you’ve seen the interface, you know it’s missing the items. If you’ve seen an item dump, you see sliding puzzle pieces. You just put it together in your mind: Oh! Item on interface!

Simply populate the interface with the given data, handle clicking based on gameplay, then redraw the interface upon updated data

Read full topic

item.title: Old Runescape Games?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:17, topic:521036”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=639544.msg4311145#msg4311145 date=1370751625]
They seem like it’d be bard to code it but unique as hell if you did.
[/quote]it’s not really hard to be honest. they provide us with everything we need. and the logic is all common sense. you just need to program it.

they’re just like sliding puzzles (item on interface, (click item on interface) / change the draw position/redraw interface)[/quote]hmm thanks for that information!

Read full topic

item.title: Old Runescape Games?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

What Vain_ said. They work like puzzle boxes.

Read full topic

What do you mean? It was kinda like barbarian assault, there were rooms for games and you would vs people in rooms like yours, and the games were based on those interfaces.

I’m just intrigued because I’ve never seen these before.
Nor interface 15068
It’s so cute xD
